prompts: Create a quirky Pokemon that resembles a bag of trash with green features and a playful attitude.
Imagine a small, green Pokemon that loves to hide in urban areas, blending in with its surroundings.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the concept of waste, featuring unique plant-like characteristics and a mischievous grin.
Generate a cute, amorphous creature that thrives in grassy environments, with a focus on earthy tones.
Show me a Pokemon that has a round body and leaf-like ears, perfect for an eco-friendly theme!
Make a Pokemon that captures the essence of recycling, with vibrant green and hints of pink.
I want a Pokemon that looks like it just emerged from a trash heap but is actually quite charming.
